National Mirror bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị na Naịjirịa
Onye isi ala Emeka Obasi tọrọ ntọala National Mirror na 2006
Mbipụta gụnyere Daily Mirror, Saturday Mirror na Sunday Mirror
Na August 2008 Barrister Jimoh Ibrahim nwetara oke 100%  nke National Mirror
Na 5 Mee 2010 Global Media Mirror Limited, ndị na-ebipụta National Mirror, weghaara Newswatch Communications Limited, ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Newswatch  kwa izu nke
